fullyQualifyCheckPointWithReadURL

protected org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path fullyQualifyCheckPointWithReadURL(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path lastCheckPointPath,
                                                                      Cluster srcCluster)
Method to qualify the checkpoint path based on the readurl configured for the source cluster. The readurl of the cluster can change and the checkpoint paths should be re-qualified to the new source cluster read path.

Parameters:
lastCheckPointPath - path which can be null read from checkpoint file.
srcCluster - the cluster for which checkpoint file which should be re-qualified.
Returns:
path which is re-qualified.
